'''Guiding Light''' are puzzles found during the ''[[Three Realms Gateway Offering]]'' [[Event]]'s [[Enkanomiya]].

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Guiding Light 1.png
|text1  = {{Color|help|The Bokuso Box can be used}} to activate the mechanisms and guide rays of light. Use Water Mirrors and Ice Mirrors to direct the light rays into Receivers and thus complete the Light Guiding Ceremony.
|image2 = Tutorial Guiding Light 2.png
|text2  = Light is refracted by Water Mirrors and reflected by Ice Mirrors. You can switch between the use of Water and Ice mirrors using Cryo and Pyro.
|image3 = Tutorial Guiding Light 3.png
|text3  = Mirrors with special bases can also be rotated.
}}
